name: node-red
description: Node-RED is a flow-based programming tool for wiring together hardware devices, APIs and online services.

commands.command: pid=$(netstat -tlnp 2>/dev/null | grep ':1880' | head -1 | awk '{print $NF}' | cut -d/ -f1); cat /proc/$pid/status | grep '^Uid:' | awk '{print $2}'
commands.description: Process on port 1880 should run as UID 1000
